allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: optimize emoji list retrieval and sort dependencies

- Remove default limit (20) from getEmojiList to allow unlimited retrieval
- Sort dependencies alphabetically in package.json
- Fix dependency ordering in peerDependencies section

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: update AI response schema and handling for single category suggestion

- 修改配置文件中的AI提示词，将newCategories数组改为newCategory单个分类建议
- 更新服务层代码，调整AI分类结果处理逻辑，支持单个新分类的处理
- 更新类型定义，将AICategorizeResult和AIAnalyzeResult中的newCategories字段改为newCategory

This change simplifies the AI categorization interface and makes the plugin more predictable when handling AI suggestions.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
